text.section:
This subtitle does not affect:
the authority granted under Subtitles 1 and 7 of this title; or
a work release program established under Subtitles 1 and 7 of this title.

section.section: With the approval of the Secretary, a county may convert a work release program established under Subtitles 1 and 7 of this title into a center that is subject to this subtitle.
The Secretary shall adopt regulations for the conversion of a work release program into a center.
